title: Senna's abilities can go through Yasuo's W
body: ...... I know it is a tradition to make new champions OP so that people will spend money buy them, however, this is TOO much... I have seen so many times that Yasuo's W fail to block Senna's abilities... Is this intentionally designed? or just bug?

replies.body:
Wall only blocks projectiles. 
But yes Senna was given an extremely full kit. She's taking some nerfs next patch. Still, her kit seems to do it all, I'm not a fan of her design the the sense of giving champs unique niche feels

Yasuo's windwall can block a tiny edge of her 1400 width shield and deny the entire map... (could also block the beam but its narrow) 

but no, Senna's autos and Q are not projectiles, neither is Lucian's Q. 
They are lasers, which do not travel and are not blocked by Wind Wall. This is not new, youre just bad.
